turns.speaker: F
turns.content: I don't want you to go.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: I know, I know. I don't want to go either baby. I love you know. And I'm going to miss you a lot.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: I'm going to miss you too; I don't know what I'm going to do here without you. It's going to be so lonely, and so hard.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: I don't want to be a single mom.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: You won't be. I'll be back; I'll be back before you know it. All right, and

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: but

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: and

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: It's dangerous; I mean how can you make sure that you'll

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: It's- It's dangerous anywhere, honey. I mean this is -this- I'm just going to go and we'll get it over with,

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: I'll come back we'll have, you know, some good benefits from being in the service and then we'll live - we'll live a happy life, then the rest of us, like the three of us.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: I hope so.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: A little family.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: I hope so.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: You gotta

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: It's going to be really rough.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: You gotta take care of our baby for me, alright?

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: I'll send you lots of pictures.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: I hope so, because I'm not going to be able to survive without all that. I don't know what I'm going to do.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: I've never been - I've never been away from you for two weeks let alone a year.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: Well, just promise me that you going to be safe.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: I mean can't they put you in like, you know kitchen work or something where you won't get

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: No, it doesn't work that way

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: but, I mean, I'm going to do whatever I can and get back here as fast as I can.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: It doesn't make any sense; I don't know why we have to be at war in the first place.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: I know, but it's not our decision, I guess, you know, I mean

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: there's people that thought it was the right thing to do so now we have to- we have to do what we have to do for our country

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: and it'll work out you know, go there and do that. Yeah, I'll be back

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: Will you write me letters, paper ones?

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: Yeah, of course. I don't know if we'll have computers or anything like that you know, so probably my only option then.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: Yeah, I'll write you every day 'cause you're the only thing that's going to be on my mind.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: Our baby needs a dad; you can't leave. Okay, you can't disappear.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: Our baby has a dad, alright. Daddy is going to be back soon.

turns.speaker: M
turns.content: I want you to, you know, take lots of video; pictures and I can see you when I get back or while I'm there. I'm going to miss you.

turns.speaker: F
turns.content: I'll miss you too.
